name: AXA Investment Managers
membership:
AXA IM is a member of national trade associations for asset managers in the EU, including AFG, IA, BVI, ALFI, Assogestioni, Inverco, BEAMA...
It is also an active corporate member of pan-European associations and industry bodies for asset managers, including EFAMA as well as the Asset Management and Investor Council (AMIC).
goal: AXA Investment Managers is a multi-expert investment manager, backed by the AXA Group, a world leader in Financial Protection.  It manages more than € 700 bn of assets for insurance, institutional and retail clients, across multiple asset classes, from offices in 22 countries in Europe, North America, Latin America and Asia.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Trade
euInitiatives:
all files related to:
- Capital Markets Union (CMU)
- asset management (AIFMD, UCITS, ELTIF)
- financial markets (MiFID)
- derivatives (EMIR, CCP Recovery and Resolution)
- benchmarks
- corporate governance (shareholders' rights directives)
- anti-money laundering
- market abuse
- credit rating agencies
- solvency 2 and CRR
- PRIIPs
